product_name: The North Face Storm Shadow Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Headed to the summit? Wear The North Face men's Storm Shadow fleece jacket, a lightweight next-to-skin or mid-layer Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fleece that wicks to keep you dry and warm. Polartec Power Dry High Efficiency gridded fleece moves moisture away from the skin and dries fast, keeping you warmer with less bulk and weight. Anatomically designed with plenty of stretch for vertical activities. Full center-front zipper has a soft garage to protect your neck. The North Face Storm Shadow Fleece Jacket for men features zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered chest stow pocket. This item is part of the North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Headed to the summit? Wear The North Face men's Storm Shadow fleece jacket, a lightweight next-to-skin or mid-layer Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fleece that wicks to keep you dry and warm.
